attributes.action: Save the Community of our sheltered accomodation
attributes.additional_details: We know nothing can be done for the building. Our concern is for our community, where once moved we could find that we would loose the community spirit which exsists at the moment.
attributes.background: We have a date for our building to be demolished, and as a result of this we will find we ought to be moved to alternative accomodation which will result people moved becoming isolated and suffering from lonliness.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
